title: Introduction to Augmented Reality (AR)
introduction: Augmented Reality (AR) is a technology that overlays digital content onto the real world, enhancing the user's perception of reality.
details: AR finds applications in fields like gaming, marketing, navigation, and industrial training. AR experiences can be delivered through smartphones, AR glasses, or head-mounted displays. Learning about augmented reality involves understanding AR development platforms, markerless tracking, and spatial mapping.
